attributes.long-description:
Different to normal games, 'Aabs Animals' is an animal entertainment content that does not have any achievement targets for players.

-To love animals
-To have the animals close to you and use them as a digital photo frame
-etc...
Have fun with the animals the way you like.

'Aabs Inc.' donates a few percentage of its sales to public organizations for animal protect etc..
About the donated organization and amount of donation, visit the official website below.
http://www.aabs.co.jp

PlayStation®Vita:
1 player(s)
1KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Dual Analog Sticks
Rear Camera
Motion Sensor

PS3™:
1 player
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
DUALSHOCK®3

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense).  Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.sonyenteretainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One time license fee entitles play on up to 2 PlayStation® 3 systems and 3 PlayStation® Vita systems activated by this account.

©Aabs Inc.
